    Orc

      2. Give me a wish — and I will wish you well
      3. I will give you — a magic spell
      4. I’m in a mood, rather wicked
      5. I seek death — or something like it
      6. Give me your spite
      7. And I will write
      8. Vicious murder, black shit — of Brigid’s womb
      9. I will bring a man — to his tomb
      10. Dead things know — buried passions, wrath and thirst
      11. I am the font — Pluto’s curse
      12. Liquid of the Mnemosyne
      13. Drink and dream
      14. And all ugly things in your sight
      15. Bitter words I will write
